com.students.testapp.exception

Class ApplicationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.students.testapp.exception.ApplicationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControllerException, DatabaseException

    public class ApplicationException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Wrapper for Runtime Exception for pretty output all errors to the UI.
    Author:
    Andrii Chernysh. E-mail : itcherry97@gmail.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
